p: The World Health Organization (WHO) officially changed the name of the disease to coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) from 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infection on February 11, 2020. The International Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses has proposed the name severe acute respiratory syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) for the causative agent of COVID-19 [ 2]. This document uses COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2, as well as 2019-nCoV infection as appropriate.
